name: Nature & Wildlife - Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
Nature & Wildlife - Jigsaw Puzzle - Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Nature & Wildlife - Jigsaw Puzzle is designed for adults and for kids.

- 5 difficulty settings: Up to 280 pieces!
- Every puzzle is unique: Different piece shapes every time!
- Saves all puzzles in progress, so you can work on several at the same time.
- 1080p HD Graphics.
- Support multiple screen sizes.
